font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 刻薄的，充满仇恨的： having or showing deep-seated resentment
【例】 the acrimonious debate between the two candidates 候选人之间言辞激烈的辩论
【近】 embittered, hard, rancorous['ræŋkərəs], resentful, sore
